SongLyrics.JpnStr: 海沿[うみぞ]いの道[みち]を 手[て]をつないで歩[ある]いた
SongLyrics.EngStr: We walked hand in hand along the road by the sea

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あの日[ひ]の約束[やくそく]はもう叶[かな]わない夜空[よぞら]の星[ほし]
SongLyrics.EngStr: That day's promise will no longer come true, stars in the night sky

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 通[とお]り過[す]ぎてゆく 人[ひと]も景色達[けしきたち]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: The people and scenery that pass by

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 気[き]づいた時[とき]は いつもおいてけぼりになってた
SongLyrics.EngStr: When I realized I was always left behind

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 季節変[きせつが]わり今[いま]も君[きみ]の事[こと] 想[おも]い出[だ]してしまうけれど
SongLyrics.EngStr: The seasons change, and I still think of you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何[なに]も無[な]かったような顔[かお]して 今日[きょう]も街[まち]に溶[と]けて行[い]く
SongLyrics.EngStr: But today, too, I'm melting into the city with a face as if nothing had happened

SongLyrics.JpnStr: さよなら もう新[あたら]しい明日[あした]へ歩[ある]き出[だ]した
SongLyrics.EngStr: Goodbye, I've already walked to a new tomorrow

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 最後[さいご]の強[つよ]がりきっと これが二[ふた]人[り]の為[ため]だよね?
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's the last time I'll be strong. This is for the both of us, right?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 待[ま]ち合[あ]わせ場所[ばしょ]いつもの桜木町[さくらぎちょう]に君[きみ]は もう来[こ]ない
SongLyrics.EngStr: At the usual meeting place in Sakuragicho, you're no longer coming.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 大[おお]きな観覧車[かんらんしゃ]「花火[はなび]みたいだね」 って
SongLyrics.EngStr: The big Ferris wheel 'looks like fireworks', you said.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 笑[わら]った君[きみ]の横顔[よこがお] 時間[じかん]が止[と]まって欲[ほ]しかった
SongLyrics.EngStr: I wanted time to stop.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 心変[こころが]わり今[いま]は責[せ]めても 違[ちが]う誰[だれ]かの元[もと]へ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if I blame you for changing my mind now, I'll go to someone else.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そして いつの日[ひ]か忘[わす]れてゆく 君[きみ]の笑顔[えがお]も泪[なみだ]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: And someday I'll forget your smile and your tears

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ありがとう さあ振[ふ]り返[かえ]らずに行[ゆ]けばいい
SongLyrics.EngStr: Thank you, don't look back, just go

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いつの日[ひ]かまた 笑[わら]って話[はな]せる時[とき]が来[く]るさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Someday we'll be able to laugh and talk again

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 初[はじ]めて君[きみ]と口付[くちづ]けた 桜木町[さくらぎちょう]で最後[さいご]の手[て]を振[ふ]るよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll wave my hand for the last time in Sakuragicho, where I first kissed you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 変[か]わり続[つづ]けてく 見慣[みな]れてた街並[まちなみ]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: The streets that I'm used to seeing keep changing

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だけど今[いま]も目[め]を閉[と]じれば あの日[ひ]の二[ふた]人[り]がそこにはいる
SongLyrics.EngStr: But even now, if I close my eyes, the two of us from that day are still there

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 繋[つな]いだ その手[て]をいつまでも離[はな]したくなかった
SongLyrics.EngStr: I didn't want to let go of the hand we held forever

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それでも行[い]かなくちゃ 僕[ぼく]らが見[み]つけた答[こた]えだから
SongLyrics.EngStr: I still have to go, because that's the answer we've found

SongLyrics.JpnStr: さよなら もう新[あたら]しい明日[あした]へ歩[ある]き出[だ]した
SongLyrics.EngStr: Goodbye, we've already started walking to a new tomorrow

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 最後[さいご]の 強[つよ]がり きっと これが二[ふた]人[り]の為[ため]だよね?
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm sure this is for the both of us, right?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 待[ま]ち合[あ]わせ場所[ばしょ]いつもの桜木町[さくらぎちょう]に君[きみ]は もう来[こ]ない
SongLyrics.EngStr: At the usual meeting place in Sakuragicho, you're no longer there.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 初[はじ]めて君[きみ]と口付[くちづ]けた桜木町[さくらぎちょう]で最後[さいご]の手[て]を振[ふ]るよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll wave my hand for the last time at Sakuragicho, where I first kissed you.

ListVocab: 待ち合わせ場所-まちあわせばしょ
心変わり-こころがわり
通り過ぎる-とおりすぎる
